definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: cover (NH id., cover, faint; Ar. galafa smear, II. cover, gila0fun sheath; As. elpitu, pining, exhaustion);—

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt.. f. covered, encrusted, cstr. [[מְעֻלֶּפֶת]] Ct So 5:14 his belly if ivory encrusted with sapphires. Pf. 3 pl. [[בָּנַיִח עֻלְּפוּ]] Is 51:20 thy sons are enshrouded, enwrapped, i.e. their senses obscured = have swooned away; so also Ez Eze 31:15, rdg. 3 fs. [[עֻלָָּפָה]] for subst. [[עֻלְפֶּה]] (Kö:ii. 1, 118), all the trees have fainted for ([[עַל]]) him (so LXX SyrVer Vulgate Hi Co al.).

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: enwrap oneself, Impf. 3 fs. [[וַתִּתְעַלָָּף]] Ge 38:14 (J); = swoon away, 3 ms. [[וַיִּתְעַלָָּף]] Jon 4:8; 3 fpl. [[תִּתְעַלַּפְנׇה]] Am 8:13.
